pullRequest.title: Removing docker 'slave' ref.. New image is inbound-agent
pullRequest.bodyText: With regards to the image change [here](❗ Warning! This image used to be published as jenkinsci/jnlp-slave and jenkins/jnlp-slave. These images are deprecated, use jenkins/inbound-agent.) and per the mailing list here, I am starting the corrections to the README

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            containerTemplate(name: 'jnlp', image: 'jenkins/ jenkins/inbound-agent:3.35-5-alpine', args: '${computer.jnlpmac} ${computer.name}'),
          
          
            
            containerTemplate(name: 'jnlp', image: 'jenkins/inbound-agent:3.35-5-alpine', args: '${computer.jnlpmac} ${computer.name}'),
          
      
    
    
  

Also, it seems only the latest version has been published (4.3-3), so the tag needs an update.
Also need to coordinate with #749
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -120,7 +120,7 @@ Find more examples in the [examples dir](examples).
 The default jnlp agent image used can be customized by adding it to the template
 
 ```groovy
-containerTemplate(name: 'jnlp', image: 'jenkins/jnlp-slave:3.35-5-alpine', args: '${computer.jnlpmac} ${computer.name}'),
+containerTemplate(name: 'jnlp', image: 'jenkins/ jenkins/inbound-agent:3.35-5-alpine', args: '${computer.jnlpmac} ${computer.name}'),

@@ -131,7 +131,7 @@ kind: Pod
 spec:
   containers:
   - name: jnlp
-    image: 'jenkins/jnlp-slave:3.35-5-alpine'
+    image: 'jenkins/ jenkins/inbound-agent:3.35-5-alpine'

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Docker image: `jenkins/ jenkins/inbound-agent`
          
          
            
            * Docker image: `jenkins/inbound-agent`
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -847,7 +847,7 @@ Set `Container Cap` to a reasonable number for tests, i.e. 3.
 
 Add an image with
 
-* Docker image: `jenkins/jnlp-slave`
+* Docker image: `jenkins/ jenkins/inbound-agent`

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Tested with [`jenkins/jenkins/inbound-agent`](https://hub.docker.com/r/jenkins/inbound-agent),
          
          
            
            Tested with [`jenkins/inbound-agent`](https://hub.docker.com/r/jenkins/inbound-agent),
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,8 +21,8 @@ For that some environment variables are automatically injected:
 * `JENKINS_AGENT_NAME`: the name of the Jenkins agent
 * `JENKINS_NAME`: the name of the Jenkins agent (Deprecated. Only here for backwards compatibility)
 
-Tested with [`jenkins/jnlp-slave`](https://hub.docker.com/r/jenkins/jnlp-slave),
-see the [Docker image source code](https://github.com/jenkinsci/docker-jnlp-slave).
+Tested with [`jenkins/jenkins/inbound-agent`](https://hub.docker.com/r/jenkins/inbound-agent),
